channel.title: BitchScape - Where bitches are reborn
channel.description:
[center][shadow=blue,left][size=36pt][abbr=You're a bitch]BitchScape[/abbr][/size] [size=14pt][abbr=But we can change that]Where bitches are reborn[/abbr][/size][/shadow][/center]
[anchor=top]Table of contents[/anchor]
[ol][li][iurl=#update]Updates[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#content]Content[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#media]Media[/iurl][list] [li][iurl=#video]Videos[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#image]Images[/iurl][/li] [/list][/li] [li][iurl=#team]The Team[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#join]Join Us![/iurl][/li][/ol]
[anchor=update]1. Updates[/anchor] [hr] [code=Updates] Game filter + commands Bank auto-reorganizes like rs (if you remove all of any item, it resets the slots) Fixed the login screen interface Fixed Combat Level on the combat tab Fixed Quest Interface Added Items kept on death Added christmas cracker (the use on player and everything) Modified my packets (Cleaned them up and combined some into one class instead of being spread over 5) Fixed the starter (for some reason it was giving the wrong items) Added mystery box system (Video, Yes/No?); Changed my banks default option; Added the Lost-and-Found random event (all types of teleportation); Fixed a bug with my Rainbow partyhat. When you replaced the hat with another item in the same slot, it would delete said item, and create a party hat with the infinity symbol. Thus making a dupe. Added Fight Caves and Fight Pits (Caves have a minor bug, soon to be addressed..). Re-doing home (adding a custom home teleport system and more..) Added Gnome Glider transportation system. Added all possible bank Id's to to first and second click objects. Added a few hundred npcs. Fixed a couple traveling bugs. Started working on a new teleport system. Finished a bit more of the home. Added global drop system Added 10 minute logout timer Added goldsmith gauntlets. Added "new" bank interface. Added cat catching system.[/code] [iurl=#top][abbr=Back to Table of Contents]Back to ToC[/iurl]
[anchor=content]2. Content[/anchor] [hr] [code=Client Features]-All data cache packed -717 Animations -717 Graphics -717 IdentityKit -525 Objects -525 Maps -602 Npcs -668 Items -Item searching (Staff only)[/code] [code=Server Features]-Skilling redone -Great combat -The best pin system -Brand new slayer system -Time based player titles -And more (I'll add later) [/code] [iurl=#top][abbr=Back to Table of Contents]Back to ToC[/iurl]
[anchor=media]3. Media[/anchor] [hr] [anchor=video]Videos: [/anchor] Pin system: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ba2TA72FBtc Sailing: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yH3v4Zp4yVg [anchor=image]Images: [/anchor] Mystery Box: [img]http://i.imgur.com/N6vMdyd.png[/img] Fight Pits (after match): [img]http://i.imgur.com/Uve2AYt.png[/img] Bank update (easy, minor, but worth showing. Yes, use and use quickly do different things on my server): [img]http://i.imgur.com/04UcPqv.png[/img] Lost and Found random: [img]http://i.imgur.com/PPXwWD7.png[/img] Fixed the black space in 'dead zones'. (See above Lost And Found picture and compare it to this one): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7gwcMIq.png[/img] Also fixed up the minimap (See basically any other image on this thread lol): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/orYIqlb.png[/img] Le kitty system (full grown cat) -May do a video.. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oCc4UCW.png[/img] "New" bank (Old bank with new sprites tacked on): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7QqWRv2.png[/img] #NoFilter [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nJ0tDCA.png[/img] #Filter (making instagram joke) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/grF6qmh.png[/img] Bank reorganizes automatically: (Most PI's don't have this) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N1oC7c3.png[/img] Combat level fixed (it used to not show the number): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BWLyPY7.png[/img] Fixed the q(int) thing in the quest interface (the id's were messed up): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Gif7TeM.png[/img] Added Item On Death: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8vYbjMe.png[/img] Added christmas cracker (Sorry I didn't capture pic with the text)[before use]: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/owbMOG0.png[/img] After use: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A9q6fY1.png[/img] And the fixed starter: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DQas7w7.png[/img] [iurl=#top][abbr=Back to Table of Contents]Back to ToC[/iurl]
[anchor=team]4. The Team[/anchor] [hr]
[ul][li]Server Developers:[/li] [list] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=341531]Sk8rdude461[/url] - Lead Developer[/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=672004]ruzylo[/url][/li] [li]<Open (Maybe)>[/li] [/list] [li]Client Developers:[/li] [list] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=341531]Sk8rdude461[/url] - Lead Developer[/li] [li]<Open>[/li] [/list] [li]Forum Staff:[/li] [list] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=341531]Sk8rdude461[/url] - Head Staff[/li] [li]<Open> - Admin[/li] [li]<Open> - Admin[/li] [/list] [li]Server Helpers[/li] [list] [li]<Open>[/li] [li]<Open>[/li] [li]<Open>[/li] [li]<Open>[/li] [/list][/ul]
[iurl=#top][abbr=Back to Table of Contents]Back to ToC[/iurl]
[anchor=join]5. Join Us![/anchor] [hr] To join my development, please take a look at my [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657772.0.html]development team thread[/url]. I will not respond to applications on this thread. [iurl=#top][abbr=Back to Table of Contents]Back to ToC[/iurl]

item.title: BitchScape - Where bitches are reborn
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’ve created a development team thread for this, as I really do need developers. The most important one would be a client developer.
The thread can be found here
[hr][hr]

I’ve recently added a brand new drop system to the server. All the data loads from json using gson. It’s faster and more efficient than ever.

Updates 

Added more features to make understanding who is/isn't staff easier.
Cleaned up more code, removed extra bits from process.
Started barrows.
ruzylo officially joined the team.
ruzylo cleaned up the npcdrops.json. Includes nulled drops and rares.
Started adding npc spawns. This includes custom zones.

Yay, we’re doing stuff

Read full topic

item.title: BitchScape - Where bitches are reborn
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:100, topic:529460”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=648217.msg4398811#msg4398811 date=1389979395]

I would only support if named BitchAssNiggaScape

I would support if it would be “FrankMyBitchNiggaScape”

Anyway, good luck bud.

aha u funny guy.

Yeah, I also support too. Have you been working on this since September or was it on/off.
[/quote]
On/off constantly.
Some times I’d work on it, others I’d leave it there for a week.
Right now I’m working on npc drops and item requirements. - The most boring shit ever.[/quote]

Have fun. I did SOOOOOO many drops for my 2006 remake. I think I did nearly 100+ npc’s to be exactly like RS all in XML… Now that’s some boring ass shit.

Read full topic

item.title: BitchScape - Where bitches are reborn
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:95, topic:529460”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=648217.msg4360201#msg4360201 date=1378577195]
BitchScape? Really? Wow.
[/quote]

[/quote]

I’m going to pull this up, again:

[quote=“Vain_, post:20, topic:529460”]is a server name really a big influence in whether you play or not?

id play a server called secrethomosexuals if the gameplay was unique and fun.
99.9% of the time when I play rsps I don’t pay attention to the name after 5 minutes because I only use the name to help my friends get on, then I just refer to it as ‘the server’[/quote]

I’m not going to sit here and debate the name of my server. If you don’t like it, piss off. It is mine and what it is named is up to me.

item.title: BitchScape - Where bitches are reborn
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Loveandpower:

It’s so strange really. I think this is probably the only third server I have seen with a filter lol

I wrote mine out by hand. So they may have it but it’s not the same as mine.

Today’s updates (Only counting today) [No media sorry]:

Rewrote Runecrafting to make it static (like all skills should be).
Added ZMI Altar (Excluding Master Runecrafter robe effect and Ardougne cloak 2 effect)

It’s rather ‘minor’ but I did a complete overhaul on the runecrafting skill.

I was considering adding the pouches, but they don’t seem worth it on a rsps. I may add them later.

Reposted for bumping purposes.

I’m honestly working on BS a lot more, and I’d love it if I could get a second developer in on this.

Read full topic

preferably a mockup image of design[/quote]

you missed sub-menus; ot gl

item.title: BitchScape - Where bitches are reborn
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Flame_:

Any updates since the dwarf cannon?

Quite a few, actually:

Added Lunar spells (Cure Me and humidify, others coming later)
Brimhaven dungeon is now fully navigate-able (you need an hatchet to chop the vines just like real RS) - Shortcuts coming soon
Finished my slayer teleport orb (takes you to the location of your task, costs slayerpoints to buy)
Added fully working Yo-Yo from 2004 christmas event.
Started working on a christmas event
Added teletabs (With correct teleports).

Annnnd I forgot what else. Man I really need to keep better track of what I do, haha.

Read full topic
